Detailed Description

Parses input data file.

This structure parses the strings from the input data file and stores the result in self.

Definition at line 131 of file ts.cpp.

Member Function Documentation

bool proj_info::advance ( ) [inline]

Puts the name and angle from the current element into the structure's members and advances icur.

Returns:
false if the last element was parsed, true otherwise.
